QuestData.Title: Keepers of the Hammer
QuestData.Description: The Highmountain Tribes had intended to pledge our allegiance to your forces. We know war has come with the Burning Legion.$b$bHowever, we have been betrayed from within and must now ask for your aid.$b$bA great relic, the Hammer of Khaz'goroth, was stolen from our people by the vile drogbar.$b$bWe need your help in recovering it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Mayla Highmountain at Thunder Totem in Highmountain.
QuestData.RewardText: I know you seek the Pillar of Creation but I am sad to say it was one of many things we lost today.

Objectives.Objective: Fly to Thunder Totem in Highmountain
Meet Warbrave Oro at Thunder Totem
